Meyer Lab Handbook Jesse Meyer 2020-10-21 Chapter 1 Welcome! Welcome to the Meyer Lab Handbook. https://jessegmeyerlab.github.io/Handbook/ The handbook was developed by Jesse Meyer as a guide for current and prospective researchers with resources, guidelines, and information about the Meyer Lab. More information on the lab and department can be found through the following resources: The Lab website MCW Biochemistry Departmental website This handbook was forked from Devin Schweppes handbook, which was adapted from and influenced by several other works from the Morey, Peele, and Ritchey groups.
